alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 10:23PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Phillips, northwestern Daniels and northern Valley Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1022 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles west of Opheim to 10 miles southeast of Malta. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta, Opheim, Whitewater, Richland, Saco, Tampico, Hinsdale, Loring, St. Marie, Port Of Opheim, Vandalia, Sleeping Buffalo, Wagner, Frenchman Reservoir, Thoeny, Baylor, Bowdoin, Glentana and Larslan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
